[[File:Festive 2016 Mash-up.jpg|thumb|Key art]]

'''Festive''' is an official Mash-up pack made by [[4J Studios]] released during Christmas 2014 and later updated and re-released in 2016. It includes 44 skins on {{LCE}}, 51 skins on {{BE}}, and 46 skins on {{3ds}}.

=== Changes between 2014 to 2016 ===
{| class="wikitable sortable" width="50%"
|+
! width=100px |Name
! width=60px |Render
! Changes
! width=60px |Render
|-
|Xmas Herobrine
|[[File:Xmas Herobrine.png|128x128px|center]]
|Due to the removal of any mention of Herobrine, his head was replaced and he was renamed to Steve Xmas Sweater 2
|[[File:Steve_Xmas_Sweater_2.png|128x128px|center]]
|-
|Stocking
|[[File:Stocking.gif|128x128px|center]]
|Has '''DisableAllArmor''' on LCE and did on BE too but due to updates stopped working and was never fixed.
|[[File:Stocking_Armor.png|128x128px|center]]
|-
|Illusioner
|[[File:Illusioner_Festive.png|128x128px|center]]
|An Illusioner texture exists in the files but only in the 2016 pack despite not existing on Bedrock.
| -
|}
